document_data.name: Dessaer
document_data.Description: Lord Dessaer was a tall [[half-elf]] with golden hair and pale skin with a faint bronze hue to it. He was well-muscled for a male, and he wore a breastplate of gleaming [[gold]] with noble accoutrements.
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], Dessaer, under the suggestion of his advisor [[Seyll Auzkovyn]], offered welcome and protection to the [[drow]] outcasts [[Ryld Argith]] and [[Halisstra Melarn]].
